Birthday of KPA Marked in Vietnam
   Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The Defence Ministry and the Ministry of Public Security of Vietnam, the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association and the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Club sent floral baskets to the DPRK embassy in Hanoi on April 24 in celebration of the 76th birthday of the Korean People's Army.
